QDomElement ChatViewPrivate::by ( const Aki::Irc::NickInfo &  sender,
const QString &  klass = QString(),
bool  self = false 
)

Creates an by element describing the active person that started the event. 

 <by identifier="username" class="klass" hostmask="hostmask" self="self">nickname</by>
Parameters:
hostmask User's hostmask
username User's username.
nickname User's nickname.
klass User's mode. Can be administrator, founder, half operator, operator, server operator or voice.
self true if the user who started the event was you; false otherwise.
Returns:
By element.

Creates an irc event element.

like joining the chat room or changing the topic.

 <event id="GHJFR785F3" name="name" occurred="time">
     ...
 </event>
Parameters:

time Time the event happened.
Returns:
Event element.

 ...

QDomElement ChatViewPrivate::message ( const QString &  msg,
bool  highlight = false,
bool  action = false,
bool  notice = false 
)

Creates a message element for when the user says something in the channel. 

 <message action="action" highlight="highlight" id="GHJFR785F3" received="time of the event"
  type="notice">msg</message>
Parameters:
msg Message the user sent.
highlight true if your name was highlighted. false otherwise.
action true if this message was an ctcp action; false otherwise.
notice true if this message was an notice; false otherwise.
Returns:
Message element.
